Application Programming Interface

End point:
In this Section we will let the user know what the API is for.

Parameters

+-----------------+--------------------------------+
|Query Parameters |Description                     |
+=================+================================+
| parameter1      |this is for parameting          |
+-----------------+--------------------------------+
| parameter 2     | etcetera                       |
+-----------------+--------------------------------+
